name: Belladonna (itch) (Button Cupcake)
description:
Belladonna n. 

1. deadly nightshade 

2. "beautiful woman" in Italian 

Life has been an endless cycle of heartbreaks and false hope, but despite all, you still dare to wish that maybe - just maybe - tonight will be different. 

Can you find salvation in this nonlinear horror VN about passions and sins with 13+1 endings? 

(Walkthrough below.)

DISCLAIMER: This game contains sensitive content, flashing lights, and more. There is no screaming sound nor explicit sexual content.

This game uses Ren'Py, whose browser version is still in BETA. For best experience, please use the DOWNLOADABLE versions.

If you are getting an error message about the DATABASE, please verify whether you have enabled 3rd-party cookies or try using a different browser.

HOW TO USE FULLSCREEN ON BROWSER:

  1. Go to the game's Preferences.
  2. Click on Fullscreen.
  3. Click anywhere in the game window. You'll be in fullscreen.
  4. To exit, go to Preferences.
  5. Click Window. You'll exit fullscreen.

DO NOT USE ITCH'S EXIT OPTION.

A game by Button Cupcake (code and script) and Chisera (art and editing) submitted for the Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam by DevTalk (detailed credits in game)
